952950.description:
We all die. Heaven is waiting for someone, meeting with loved ones and peace. Someone torture and misery in hell. However, some have to go through purgatory - a place that is the personification of the human soul.
Good people can easily go to heaven. Sinners will have to contemplate the horrors in order to get out of this ill-fated place.



You are not going to play for the best person. All his life he was a real monster. Since childhood, the character has stolen money from his weak classmates. In his student years he committed crimes, for which he was not always been punished. Even the girl left him, because he did not trust her, and therefore he went on treason, which is why they later parted. This person was trying to get rid of the complexes with the violence, to find himself even someone in this life. However, once he crossed the line...
You have to find out what a terrible sin lies in the soul of this character.



  • Story mode - atone for your sins to get out of purgatory to a better place;
  • "Hardcore game mode - end the game without any firearms and without saving, show what you can do;
  • "Arena" game mode - for how long can you hold out against your own demons?;
  • 6 completely different locations that characterize the soul of the protagonist;
  • 3 types of firearms with excellent shooting physics, melee weapon and the your trusty smartphone;
  • Several styles of passing game: carefully, or through;
  • An oppressive atmosphere that cannot be conveyed in simple words;
  • Bloodthirsty enemies, your inner demons.


The game was not intended to offend or offend anyone.
Everything shown in "03.04" is a figment of the imagination.
All the similarities with reality are random.
952950.supported_languages:
俄语*, 英语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
